column2: an A.M. Eatery////I'll say up front that I'm a bit of a foodie.  That said
column3: we were on vacation (from the Chicago suburbs) and passing through Houston.  After sticking our heads inside of
column4: and then fleeing two other breakfast eateries
column5: we drove another 20 minutes to get to Snooze.  Based on the reviews and the hip vibe
column8: but very rushed.  The food was OK
column9: but nothing to write home about.  Other than the trendy space
column10: this is Denny's or Cracker Barrel food.
